Header: Three killed and eight injured in two accidents
Content: Three persons have been killed and eight others injured in two accidents. Two died as a motor vehicle collided with a three-wheeler. The accident occurred at Karambagalamulla in Ambalantota. Police point out that the vehicle driverâ€™s negligence was the cause for theaccident. Meanwhile, an accident occurred in the Malagala area in Padukka. The accident occurred when a three-wheeler collided head-on with a lorry. The victim was a 61 year old woman. Her husband and nine-month-old grandson are hospitalized with injuries. Police said that the accident occurred when the three-wheeler attempted to overtake another vehicle.
